name: WraithWizardVR Demo
description:
Cast your spells by holding the grab button on your VR controller. Draw which spell you want to cast in the air and then shoot them with trigger. Current spells: 

L - Teleport to where the projectile lands 

O - Magic Shield 

Lightning - Lightning ball (Just damage)

S - Stun projectile (Half damage but stuns enemy)

In this demo you go to a underworld level where you fight off some ghosts in your way to reach your goal. Enjoy.
